text.name: sys_description
text.text: Mozilla Firefox, or simply Firefox, is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary, Mozilla Corporation. It uses the Gecko rendering engine to display web pages, which implements current and planned web standards. It therefore allows you to browse the net in a fluid and secure way to consult any type of content.
